Name: Sweeping the Ruins
About the game: ENTER THE RUINS... For players looking for cooperative social experiences, Sweeping the Ruins letâ€™s two players engage in asymmetrical combat with an overpowered behemoth, using only the traps and destructible terrain in a mystical ruin as their weapons. Key Features 2 player online co-op Multiple traps including throwable bombs, explosive barrels, ballistas, and giant wrecking balls Destructible terrain 1 large monster About Us This game was created as part of the University of Southern California's (USC) Advanced Games Project (AGP) with collaboration from Otis College of Art and Design and California State University, Fullerton.
